ISSUE.TITLE: DMN collection function delegates using numbers
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Using collection function delegates with numbers in the target collection causes improper results. When using expression using numbers as target collections results in parsing the numbers as Strings which results in an improper lookup.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #2269 fixes list of collection related operators in order to determine the correct operator type (in decision table editor)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #2270 fixed handling BigInteger as target collection type in collection function delegates
